member.name: IActivateAudioInterfaceAsyncOperation.GetActivateResult
member.summary: Gets the results of an asynchronous activation of a WASAPI interface initiated by an application calling the function.

returns.para: The function returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The method was called before the asynchronous operation was complete.

member.name: IActivateAudioInterfaceAsyncOperation
member.summary: Represents an asynchronous operation activating a WASAPI interface and provides a method to retrieve the results of the activation.
